name: RalphGame Combat Demo
description:
Welcome to the second demo for RalphGame! In this demo, you'll need to defeat two enemies using an array of 12 different moves. Comment your time down below and see if anyone's beat you, bonus points if you can record and upload your gameplay on YouTube!

Here are the controls:

On top of all this, this demo is Gamepad accessible, or controller-friendly. An image with the controller scheme can be found below :)
